General.Name: Shenzhen Rapoo Technology
General.Description: Shenzhen Rapoo Technology Co., Ltd. research, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells wired and wireless peripheral products worldwide. The company offers wired and wireless mouse and keyboards, wired and wireless combo sets, and office product accessories; intelligent wear glasses; conferencing peripherals, such as webcams, audio-visual headsets, conference cameras, microphone, and page turning pens; and mobile peripheral, including power adapters, wireless chargers, USB-C hubs, power/data cables. It also provides bluetooth wireless headsets; and game peripherals, including gaming keyboards, mouse, headsets, combos, and microphones, as well as gamepads. In addition, the company offers personalized and themed products from the perspective of women under Ralemo brand name. It offers its products under the Rapoo brand. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: China Energy Storage Building, Shenzhen, China, 518048
